Home » 40P13 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanahetuttika
9.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Dassanahetuttika
Paṭiccādivāra
37.
91Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
92Hetuyā chabbīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate chabbīsa. (Vitthāretabbaṃ.)
